str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

str2: To rest upon, rely on, trust in. Middle voice from epi and anapano; to settle on; literally or figuratively.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
But if not, else, otherwise. From ei, de, and me; but if not.

str2: To bend or turn back; I return. From ana and kampto; to turn back.
